page.title: 09Barnt Green Railway Station
page.content: The Gloucester to Birmingham line was opened in l840 and the station at Barnt Green was provided in l846. The{branch line}to Ashchurch via Redditch opened in l859. The tracks were{widened}in l928 and now this station is important in providing transport for the local people. They use it for going to{work}and{shopping in Birmingham and Redditch. The station was very important when there was a{cattle market}in the village. To-day as well as being an important station for{commuters,}many inter-city trains travel through reaching speeds of 100 m.p.h.
